% Test für input etc.

\catcode`\{=1 % left brace is begin-group character
\catcode`\}=2 % right brace is end-group character

\the\inputencoding
\inputencoding{UTF-8}
\the\inputencoding

%\input testdata/testinputold

%\inputfile{testdata/testinputnew}
\message{***********}
\inputfileencoding{ISO8859-1}{testdata/testinputnew}
